readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.11/f Haley 500/p Haley/p Emily: 50s/6 20/farmer -10 -10 0 Haley 5 20 1 Emily 8 20 3/skippable/pause 1000/shake Haley 500/pause 500/speak Haley "呃啊啊！老是我打掃坐墊下面！這週輪到你了！$a"/emote Emily 12/speak Emily "你真孩子氣，海莉。這房子裡大部分的家務都是我做的，你心知肚明。$u"/pause 200/warp farmer 2 24/playSound doorClose/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 2/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "哦，是那個新來的農場男孩。$7^哦，是那個新來的農場女孩。$7"/faceDirection Emily 3/speak Emily "他有名字的。$u^她有名字的。$u"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "嘿，你會理解我的。"/emote farmer 8/speak Emily "*唉*……抱歉把你牽扯進來了 @。海莉在抱怨我讓她打掃坐墊下面。$u"/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "$q 45 無#那是因為上週是我打掃的！$a#$r 46 -50 Event_clean2#少廢話，趕緊打掃！#$r 45 30 Event_clean1#海莉，何不每週固定打掃一次呢？#$r 46 -30 Event_clean3#艾米麗，這次就去打掃吧。"/fork haleyWontDoIt/stopMusic/faceDirection Haley 3/emote Haley 12/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "好吧，你贏了。不出意外這就成了我每週的工作了。然後就不用再爭吵了。$u"/faceDirection Haley 2/speak Emily "非常感謝。 @。圓滿解決了呢。$h"/pause 1000/end
content.haleyWontDoIt: move Haley -2 0 0/move Haley 0 -2 0/emote Haley 12/faceDirection Emily 1/emote Emily 28/speak Emily "*唉*……那我去打掃吧……$s"/pause 1000/end
content.12/f Haley 1000/p Haley: ragtime/-1000 -1000/farmer 16 20 1 Haley 18 16 0/skippable/showFrame Haley 20/shake Haley 500/viewport 15 16 true/pause 500/shake Haley 500/pause 500/speak Haley "唔嗯嗯嗯……我打不開這個罐子！$a#$b#……$s"/pause 400/shake Haley 500/move farmer 0 -4 1/shake Haley 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3 true/showFrame Haley 21/emote Haley 16/speak Haley "噢！是你啊……@對吧？"/pause 1000/speak Haley "$q 47 null#話說……你挺有勁的，對吧？#$r 47 30 Event_jar1#是#$r 47 -30 Event_jar2#不是"/faceDirection Haley 3/animate farmer false true 100 111/pause 400/playSound fishingRodBend/startJittering/pause 500/stopJittering/pause 200/playSound fishingRodBend/startJittering/pause 500/stopJittering/pause 200/playSound fishingRodBend/startJittering/pause 2000/stopJittering/playSound coin/stopAnimation farmer/animate farmer false true 100 112/jump farmer/pause 1500/pause 200/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Haley 21/speak Haley "你還真打開了欸！你比看起來還要強壯！$h"/pause 400/emote farmer 12/pause 500/emote Haley 20/pause 500/speak Haley "謝謝！$h"/pause 500/end

Event_darkroom2#這是幹什麼的？#$r -1 -50 Event_darkroom3#我見過比這更好的。"/faceDirection Haley 0/emote Haley 40/pause 500/speak Haley "唔……話說回來……有什麼事嗎？$s"/faceDirection Haley 0/question haleyDarkRoom content.917409/e 463391/f Emily 1500/p Emily: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 16 10 0 Emily 14 6 2/specificTemporarySprite EmilyBoomBox/skippable/viewport 14 6 true/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -2 0 0/speak Emily "請進@！我要向你展示一樣東西。$h"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Emily "這是我的一個秘密愛好……我已經練習好幾個月了。#$b#現在，坐好，放鬆，想像自己被帶到一個很美好的地方……好了嗎？"/stopMusic/pause 600/move Emily 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 1000/animate Emily false true 300 50 51/pause 1600/speak Emily "$q 213 null#所以……*喘氣*……你感覺怎麼樣？$h#$r 213 25 event_dance1#這太奇妙了！#$r 213 -50 event_dance2#真尷尬……#$r 213 25 event_dance1#（保持沉默並緩緩鼓掌）"/emote Emily 28/speak Emily "唷……這東西太消耗體力了……$u"/pause 500/stopAnimation Emily/showFrame Emily 0/pause 1000/animate Emily false true 100 48 49/pause 1000/speak Emily "自從我在阿比蓋爾的畢業典禮上點了一盤胡椒食物後，我再也沒有出過這麼多汗！$h"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Emily/speak Emily "……嗯，我最好洗個澡。感謝你來看我表演。"/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/end dialogue Emily "不要將跳舞的事告訴任何人。只有你能看。"
content.471942/f Emily 500/p Emily: none/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Emily 20 4 3/skippable/showFrame Emily 33/specificTemporarySprite EmilySleeping/viewport 19 4 true/emote Emily 24/pause 3000/emote Emily 24/pause 3000/viewport move 0 -1 5000/pause 1000/globalFade .004/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic EmilyDream/changeToTemporaryMap EmilyDreamscape false/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp Emily 21 11/warp farmer 22 15/animate Emily false true 500 24 25/globalFadeToClear .005 true/viewport move 0 -1 7000/viewport 21 18/pause 8000/textAboveHead Emily "阿彌-陀佛"/pause 4000/textAboveHead Emily "阿瀰瀰彌-陀佛"/pause 5000/playSound yoba/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 600/stopAnimation Emily/showFrame Emily 26/jump Emily/shake Emily 1000/pause 1000/showFrame Emily 0/pause 500/move Emily -1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 2/pause 1000/emote Emily 8/pause 500/speak Emily "您怎麼會在這裡？$u"/pause 1000/move Emily 0 2 2/viewport move 0 1 1500/move Emily -1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite EmilySign/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 2000/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 8000/faceDirection Emily 1/pause 1000/speak Emily "……$u#$b#這讓我想到了一件事。$u#$b#即使最細微、柔和、單純的光線中也會藏有一個奇妙的秘密。"/pause 1000/speak Emily "現在我知道你為什麼在這裡了。這是一個跡象。哈哈哈！$h"/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/startJittering/pause 1000/playSound coin/stopJittering/warp farmer -1000 -1000/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 50/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Emily 2/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 2000/globalFade .005/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 3000/changeLocation HaleyHouse/warp Emily 20 4/globalFadeToClear .005 true/viewport 20 3/pause 3000/move Emily -2 0 2/move Emily 0 3 2/pause 2000/speak Emily "@……有些特別的@……$u#$b#我們的命運將交織在一起……$u"/pause 1500/end
content.195019/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0/pause 1000/message "出於某些原因，你決定把手放到口袋裡..."/pause 500/message "你摸著兔子的腳，感覺如釋重負..."/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "嗨！"/textAboveHead Abigail "嘿！"/textAboveHead Leah "看誰來了！"/pause 2000/move farmer 4 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Abigail "我們剛才在聊路易斯鎮長和瑪妮的八卦...$h"/pause 500/speak Penny "我個人覺得他們之間沒有什麼內情…"/pause 500/speak Haley "哈！你太天真了吧？$h"/jump Penny/emote Penny 12/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和女生小團體待了一會。"/pause 1000/message "這次聚會無事發生！"/pause 500/end
content.195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0 Pierre -1000 -1000 1/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "別跑那麼快！"/textAboveHead Abigail "別動！"/textAboveHead Leah "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Abigail "呵，沒想到你所有的「女朋友」會出現在一個房間裡吧，@?$a"/pause 500/speak Leah "我...我還以為你和其他男人不一樣...$s^你騙取了我們所有人的愛…你真是太可怕了...$a"/pause 500/speak Penny "你怎麼能這樣對我們，@?$s"/pause 500/speak Maru "你真覺得自己是情場高手，是嗎？以為自己游刃有餘、如魚得水？真是個花心大蘿蔔...$a"/pause 500/speak Emily "那...那天晚上在帳篷裡...黑暗中你在我耳邊輕聲說了那麼多甜言蜜語…$s#$b#原來一切都是謊言，現在知道真相的我該如何面對每一天。$s"/pause 500/playMusic ragtime/speak Haley "好了，我們女人要團結起來！我們不能忍受這種事情！$a^我們不會再忍受你的傷害了！$a"/textAboveHead Leah "沒錯！"/pause 500/speak Abigail "嗯？你還有什麼要為自己辯解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#對不起...我以前做錯了。#女士們，冷靜一下！我可以解釋..."/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Maru "哼..."/pause 500/speak Abigail "說得好聽，但這事不能就這麼算了…$u"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Haley "...我們已經決定了...對嗎，女孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "...是的。$s"/speak Leah "當然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 3/end warpOut
content.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Haley "我深表懷疑..."/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#我認為我們只是朋友！我不知道事情這麼嚴重！#皮埃爾向我施壓！他想賣出更多花束！#女士們，這再正常不過了！這只是生活方式的選擇..."/pause 100/fork lifestyleChoice/textAboveHead Haley "騙子！"/textAboveHead Maru "對，沒錯！"/speak Emily "你真以為我們會相信嗎？你給自己挖了一個更大的坑...$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，女孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "…是的。$s"/speak Leah "當然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
content.lifestyleChoice: pause 100/speak Penny "哼！我不知道在祖祖城什麼是「正常」，但我絕對不會接受！$a"/speak Maru "如果我們根本不知道的話，那這就不是「選擇」！$a"/pause 100/speak Abigail "你別想這樣矇混過關，@.$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，女孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "…是的。$s"/speak Leah "當然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
content.150938/n emilyStones: SunRoom/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Emily 15 18 2 Haley 12 18 2 Abigail 14 20 2 Caroline 13 20 2 Marnie 16 20 2/skippable/positionOffset Haley 0 32/showFrame Emily 54/showFrame Marnie 35/showFrame Haley 34/hideShadow Haley true/showFrame Abigail 53/showFrame Caroline 24/addObject 14 21 66 1/addObject 16 21 70/addObject 12 19 68 1/addObject 15 19 64 1/addObject 13 21 60 1/viewport 14 19 true/pause 4000/speak Emily "好的……大家都拿到石頭了。#$b#來，閉上雙眼，然後慢慢地深呼吸。集中注意力到你的胸腔。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "想像有純淨的能量隨著呼吸流進身體中。#$b#呼氣的時候，感受到壓力和負能量流動出去，每次呼吸都變得更加輕鬆。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "然後，用心去呼應石頭的振動頻率。感受到什麼了？"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Abigail "沒有。"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Marnie "我有！"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Caroline "很輕鬆"/pause 4000/emote Haley 24/pause 1000/emote Haley 24 true/viewport move 1 -1 7000/pause 4000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "看來寶石有很不錯的效果……"/end
